nodes.text: Lake Shoril was a medium-sized lake on the planet Naboo. The Gungan town of Shoril was built beneath the surface of the lake in a fairly shallow area of water, meaning that it was visible from the lake's surface, especially at night.
Lake Shoril was mentioned in Rise of the Separatists, a roleplaying supplementary sourcebook for the Star Wars Roleplaying series that was published by Fantasy Flight Games in 2019.
